T02TD2947E:26b-0: @26b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2947E:26b-1: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas /
T02TD2947E:26b-2: sa stegs gru gsum me long gi ngos ltar byas la /
T02TD2947E:26b-3: thig gdab ste dbus ste ba mu khyud kyis bskor la lte ba ljang gu mu khyud dmar po sna tshogs padmas bskor /
T02TD2947E:26b-4: gru chad ljang gu bar khyams gnyis pa dkar ser sgo dang sgo khyud du bcas pa bris la /
T02TD2947E:26b-5: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa la gi wang gis mtshan ma rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pa btab la las thams cad pa'i bum pa la sku dkar gyis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la byang du bzhag / p'u dza ji ltar 'byor pa dang ba lim bsham /
T02TD2947E:26b-6: lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings la mthe bong bsgrengs la srin lag sbyar te mdzub mo phyis nas /
T02TD2947E:26b-7: nas gang gis ma reg pa byas la mthe'u chung blang la /
T02TD2947E:26b-8: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2947E:26b-9: ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bum pa'i nang du pam dang mam las padma nyi ma brtsegs pa'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang ser phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi bum pa rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pas kha bcad pa /
T02TD2947E:26b-11: sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02TD2947E:26b-12: dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2947E:26b-13: zhal yid tsam khro ba yan lag sprul rigs bzhis brgyan pa bskyed do //
T02TD2947E:26b-14: de'i thugs ka'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas nas /
T02TD2947E:26b-15: aom badzra dzny'a na h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2947E:26b-16: h'um zhes brjod pas ye shes sems dpa' 'dra ba zla ba'i gdan la bskyed la de nyid la mchod pa dang gtor ma bya'o //
T02TD2947E:26b-17: de'i thugs ka'i h'um la dmigs te /
T02TD2947E:26b-18: bdag nyid khrus bya ba dang /
T02TD2947E:26b-19: gos brje pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2947E:26b-21: bsdus pa la stong phrag gcig / shin tu bsdus pa la stong phrag bzlas te /
T02TD2947E:26b-22: slob ma la srung skud gdags pa dang /
T02TD2947E:26b-23: dam tshig dang sdom pa 'bogs pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2947E:26b-24: dkyil 'khor du gzhug / gzungs nyi shu rtsa gcig bklag tu gzhug / de nas lha ngo bstan /
T02TD2947E:27a-1: tu rdo rje dang dril bu'i sgras dkyil 'khor bskor /
T02TD2947E:27a-2: dbang rdzogs par byin la gos brje /
T02TD2947E:27a-4: de yang mchod pa dbul ba dang /
T02TD2947E:27a-9: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul /
T02TD2947E:27a-11: dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa'i cho ga dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
